meanings.definition: The cell body of a neuron, containing the nucleus and other organelles.
meanings.sent1: The perikarya of the neuron play a crucial role in transmitting signals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the perikarya to understand how neurons function.
meanings.sent3: The perikarya of the neuron threw a party for the nucleus and organelles.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city of the neuron, the perikarya is the central hub.
meanings.sent5: The perikarya, like a bustling city center, is where all the important decisions are made.
